dontYouHaveAnAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up.

title: Title
easyDescription: Experience the ease and simplicity of our inventory control management solution, designed to seamlessly organize and track your inventory with just a few clicks.
fastDescription: Accelerate your business operations with our high-speed inventory control management system, enabling you to efficiently manage stock levels, streamline workflows, and ensure prompt order fulfillment.
freeDescription: Unlock the power of efficient inventory management without spending a dime. Our feature-rich and cost-free inventory control software empowers businesses of all sizes to optimize stock levels, reduce waste, and maximize profitability.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
contactUsDescription: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
/dashboard:
On the dashboard, you can see the latest 5 completed sales and purchases, top 5 customers, daily profit growth and product type distribution, out of stock products, pending sales, total profit and singular product. For more detailed information, you can contact us.
Note: Daily profit growth only shows the data since the beginning of the current month.
/purchases: On the purchases page, you can see the list of all purchases. You can add a new purchase by clicking the "Add" button. You can edit a purchase by clicking the "Edit" button. If you check "Transaction is paid." checkbox, you can't edit the purchase. The only way to edit is contacting admin. Delete is not allowed. You can filter the list by the shown columns. You can export the list as a PDF or Excel file.
/sales: On the sales page, you can see the list of all sales. You can add a new sale by clicking the "Add" button. You can edit a sale by clicking the "Edit" button. If you check "Transaction is paid." checkbox, you can't edit the sale. The only way to edit is contacting admin. Delete is not allowed. You can filter the list by the shown columns. You can export the list as a PDF or Excel file.
/products: On the products page, you can see the list of all products. You can add a new product by clicking the "Add" button. You can edit a product by clicking the "Edit" button. You can delete a product by clicking "Delete" button after clicking on the checkbox(es). Multiple delete is allowed. You can filter the list by the shown columns. You can export the list as a PDF or Excel file.
/customers: On the customers page, you can see the list of all customers. You can add a new customer by clicking the "Add" button. You can edit a customer by clicking the "Edit" button. You can delete a customer by clicking "Delete" button after clicking on the checkbox(es). Multiple delete is allowed. You can filter the list by the shown columns. You can export the list as a PDF or Excel file.
/suppliers: On the suppliers page, you can see the list of all suppliers. You can add a new supplier by clicking the "Add" button. You can edit a supplier by clicking the "Edit" button. You can delete a supplier by clicking "Delete" button after clicking on the checkbox(es). Multiple delete is allowed. You can filter the list by the shown columns. You can export the list as a PDF or Excel file.
/purchases/add: Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip. Once "Transaction is paid." is marked. You can't edit the purchase anymore.
/purchases/edit: Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip. Once "Transaction is paid." is marked. You can't edit the purchase anymore.
/sales/add: Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip. Once "Transaction is paid." is marked. You can't edit the sale anymore.
/sales/edit: Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip. Once "Transaction is paid." is marked. You can't edit the sale anymore.
/products/add: Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip. Product Type will be seen on dashboard page. Just adding the product doesn't mean that it will be added to the stock. You need to add a purchase for that product.
/products/edit:
Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip.
Note: You should be careful while editing the prices, it may cause data mismatch.
/customers/add: Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip. If you are using autocomplete of the browsers, address line 1 may not be filled correctly. You should fill it manually.
/customers/edit: Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip. If you are using autocomplete of the browsers, address line 1 may not be filled correctly. You should fill it manually.
/suppliers/add: Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip.
/suppliers/edit: Each field has validations. Validations and information about the field can be seen on the tooltip.
/settings: On the settings page, you can change your company information. You can change your company name, address, phone number, email address etc. If you are using autocomplete of the browsers, address line 1 may not be filled correctly. You should fill it manually. Selected currency will be seen on the related pages.
/profile: On the profile page, you can change your password. You should enter your current password and new password. New password should be at least 6 characters long. You can also change name, surname etc. Email can't be changed. If the language is changed, it will reflect directly.
